description.value:
Wondrous item, uncommon
This combination sap bucket and tap is used to extract sap from certain trees. After 1 hour, the bucketful of sap magically changes into a potion. The potion remains viable for 24 hours, and its type depends on the tree as follows: oak (potion of resistance), rowan (@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.ytlsBjYsZ7OBSEBs]{potion of healing}), willow (@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.nXWevqtV6p484N59]{potion of animal friendship}), and holly (@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.aMnWi1WXWpxRHq4r]{potion of climbing}). The treebleed bucket can magically change sap 20 times, then the bucket and tap become nonmagical.
